INTRODUCTION
Integrated Medical Sensors (IMS) Inc. provides simple and effective glucose monitoring system for diabetes management using a modern solution.
A PATIENT-CENTERED SYSTEM
WIRELESS OPERATION
No wires, no hassle design!
CONVENIENT USE
No skin patches, you have the freedom and control of a wearable solution. No more irritations!
ECONOMICAL SOLUTION
Cutting-edge technology makes the IMS system significantly cheaper than current solutions, so you can focus on what matters most - your life!

PRODUCT
TEAM
We have a dedicated team of engineers with more than 20 years of combined experience in microelectronics, nanotechnology and electrochemical sensors, industry leader in implantable glucose sensors, leading endocrinologists, serial entrepreneur, and experts in embedded and mechanical designs.
SYSTEM COMPONENTS
We built the world's smallest glucose sensor (smaller than a sesame seed) with revolutionary nanotechnology. This makes it possible to get 10 times longer lifetime at 10 times lower cost!
The user wears a reader that is a wireless bridge between the sensor and their smart phone or watch.
The app we built analyzes trends in your blood glucose and make automatic adjustments working with the people and services you trust.
The online profile lets you customize the solution to your needs so you donâ€™t need to adjust your life. The system adjusts to your lifestyle!
PROJECT STATUS: FDA_SIGN
We have developed and verified the system in lab.
We are working to test the system on humans so we can get it approved by the FDA and into your hands.
